lead_paragraph: Severomorsk, home to a naval base and roughly 50,000 people, is shrouded in smoke and fumes for a three-day military exercise.
snippet: Severomorsk, home to a naval base and roughly 50,000 people, is shrouded in smoke and fumes for a three-day military exercise....

headline.main: Russia, in Military Exercise, Pits Fog of War Against Dogs of War
